sentences.sContent: He took up the cause with evangelical fervor .
sentences.sContent_eng: He took up the cause with evangelical fervor .
sentences.sCn: 他以传道者般的热情投身于这一事业。

sentences.sContent: The cathedral at Chartres is an expression of the religious fervor of the Middle Ages.
sentences.sContent_eng: The cathedral at Chartres is an expression of the religious fervor of the Middle Ages.
sentences.sCn: 在查特雷斯的大教堂是中世纪时期宗教热情的表现之一。

sentences.sContent: As social conflicts continue tosharpen, the party needs to divert attention, and of course a parade is a goodway to do that by whipping up nationalist fervor.
sentences.sContent_eng: As social conflicts continue tosharpen, the party needs to divert attention, and of course a parade is a goodway to do that by whipping up nationalist fervor.
sentences.sCn: 随着社会冲突继续深化，中共需要转移人们的注意力，而阅兵就是实现这一点的好办法，可以激起人们的民族主义热情。

words.tran: 热心的；强烈的；炽热的；热烈的
